title: English (1841) Hexapla Study Bible - 6 Full Versions
description: English (1841) Hexapla Study Bible - 6 Full Versions: The 1841 edition of the Hexapla Study Bible, published by Samuel Bagster in London, is a significant compilation featuring the New Testament in both the original Greek text and six English translations. These English versions include those by Wycliffe, Tyndale, Cranmer, as well as translations from the Geneva Bible, the Douai Bible, and the King James Bible. Presented in parallel columns, this format allows for an easy comparison across the six translations and the Greek text. The Hexapla Study Bible provides a unique and comprehensive view of the progression and variation in Biblical translation into English. This notable work was reprinted in 1990 by Vintage Archives in Columbus, Ohio, offering accessibility to this important resource for historical and comparative studies of Biblical texts.
provider: Samuel Bagster and Sons, Paternoster Kon
